content: free pattern can be found on my blog https //paintitcolorful blogspot com/2021/03/amigurumi-chick-free-pattern html the pattern includes how to make the frog and bunny hat **materials you will need ** sport weight yarn in yellow orange green and pink colour 2 5 mm crochet hook or the size you need depending on yarn you use a pair of 8 mm and 6 mm safety/ flatback eyes polyester stuffing tapestry needle black embroidery thread small piece of pink felt hope you will enjoy crocheting this cute little chick as much as i did
